channel.title: [Any Help Appreciated] Channel channel [667]
channel.description:
ANY HELP AT ALL IS APPRECIATED!
Hello guys trying to make it so my server will init a player, I got that, but now when creating a new session as such:
[code]Session session = new Session(Channel channel);[/code]
How do I get that Channel? I have a null in there now, when i try to log in, it just logs me right out, and in the command prompt it says because of Nullpointerexception, I believe this is why. Where do I get a channel? or how do I turn a String into a Channel?
------------------------------------EDIT------------------------------------ It's package is: org.jboss.netty.channel I guess I just don't know what a Channel is? I know it's what connects them to the server, but idk how to initialize one...

item.title: [Any Help Appreciated] Channel channel [667]

item.description:

ANY HELP AT ALL IS APPRECIATED!

Hello guys trying to make it so my server will init a player, I got that, but now when creating a new session as such:

Where do I get a channel? or how do I turn a String into a Channel?

------------------------------------EDIT------------------------------------
It’s package is: org.jboss.netty.channel
I guess I just don’t know what a Channel is?
I know it’s what connects them to the server, but idk how to initialize one…
